name: Wonder Boy Run
description:
Enjoy the crazy RUN game with new fantasy theme and environments.

Wonder Boy keeps busy running and collecting coins in this action-filled game!
Excellent running dash game and offers fun & entertainment for all age group players.

RUN BOY RUN is a unique parkour game on market.
You just need to control the game with 2 finger.
The gameplay is based on the classic parkour game but added ‘slide’ function.
Jump upward by pressing JUMP and slide over by pressing SLIDE.
It's very easy to learn. But if you wanna get a high score, you still need to use many skills.
You will meet different obstacles and landforms in different levels.
Just enjoy the super bonus after playing a while and enter a zone full of gold coins!
You can shift the amazing characters as you like.
What's more, there’re several adorable pets in this game!
Just enjoy this awesome parkour game.
Features
classic but unique
artful level setting
amazing characters and pets
challenge yourself
